Description:
Large on Living and Light The Joys of a Single Storey Home
Enjoy the benefits of single storey living in this coastal home with its flowing floor plan and vast open plan living area. Featuring raked ceilings with clerestory windows for optimal natural light, and stack sliding doors on the North and West allowing you to seamlessly extend your living space to the outdoors.
Within walking distance to the Quay Oval Reserve and within close proximity to The Dunes Shopping Village and schools.
What YOU'LL LOVE
- Two living areas inside and two outdoor alfresco areas
- Modern functional kitchen featuring 40mm stone waterfall island bench
- Impressive walk in butlers pantry
- Aluminum stack sliding doors in main living
- Large master with ensuite with double vanity
- Gas central heating, evaporative cooling and gas log fireplace
- Ceiling fans in bedrooms
- Timber plantation shutters to front of house
- Electric blinds on clerestory windows
- Private yard surrounded by well established garden by Eco Beach Landscaping
- Water sprinkling system
- Security system
- Side gate access
- 700m walk to the Sands Clubhouse and 1km to the beach
What the VENDOR LOVES:
"When we decided to make the move to Torquay we wanted an open plan with light filled rooms which gave us an inside outside feel. Where we built is in a very friendly neighborhood and in a quiet street, it has the added advantage of being only 1 km to the beach and quite often we hear the surf crashing on to the shore. We also enjoy the Torquay lifestyle."
Internal area
278.7m²
Insights: 3 Veronica Lane, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Solid Custom Home Offering An Abundance of Space
The perfect home for those that want space and love to entertain has hit the market. This solid and spacious single level home is positioned in the sought after Wombah Park area on a generous land holding of 780m2.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- 36 squares of house - 42 squares with outdoor alfresco areas
- Open plan main living area
- 2.7m ceilings throughout
- Large outdoor alfresco area off the kitchen
- Second living area positioned away from the main living space
- Spacious home office with built in cabinetry
- Master bedroom with WIR and ens with double vanity and spa bath
- Solar Panels 5KW System
- Split System in main living area and ducted heating throughout
- Surround sound
- Tropical style garden with Gazebo, large grassed yard and garden shed
- Garden water feature and irrigation
- 700m level stroll to the beach
- Freshly painted
- Room in the front for boat/caravan storage
- Oversized remote double lock up garage
What THE VENDOR LOVES:
We love the openness of the home and the large protected pergola has been used many times to entertain. We love the amount of storage in the oversized garage and through the house. We can hear the ocean and enjoy being able to walk to the beach in under 10 minutes.
Internal area
334.44m²

Description:
Views and location that will take your breath away
Make your goal this year to build your dream and customise a home that suits your every need. This is the ultimate position to do exactly that. With incredible panoramic bay views in a beautifully established part of Highton, surrounded by incredible homes, within walking distance to the Barwon River tracks, and central hub to the amenities of Highton, Newtown and the Geelong CBD. If you are after the ultimate location with incredible views to match, this site has everything you could ask for.
Features include:
Features include:
- 510m2 (approx) prime elevated land with minimal fall
- Panoramic Bay and valley views
- Walk to Barrabool Hills Shopping Centre
- A few minutes drive to Highton Village, Pakington Street and the CBD
- Walk to the Barrabool River/ Buckley Falls walking tracks
- Queens Park Golf Course only a few minutes drive
- Sacred Heart, St Josephs and Geelong College only a few minutes away
- Public Transport close by

Description:
ELITE FAMILY EXCELLENCE WITH SOARING OCEAN VIEWS
Positioned on top of the hill in Jan Juc commanding panoramic ocean views is this elite family residence that has been designed and built to compliment a relaxed and easy lifestyle with an emphasis on effortless indoor / outdoor living with entertaining options guaranteed to impress.
Constructed over two levels, downstairs offers a guest suite with en-suite and built in robes, a sensational rumpus room complete with kitchenette that opens out to an outdoor paved seating area and a massive 4 car garage with workshop. Upstairs consists of the master bedroom including en-suite with freestanding bath, his and her walk in robes and a 3rd living / reading room or study with direct access to the outdoors and in-ground pool and spa, three further bedrooms incorporating built in robes, desks and ceiling fans, with one bedroom feeding off the tremendous balcony, central family bathroom and sizeable laundry. The open plan living, dining and kitchen are the masterpiece of the home showcasing soaring ocean views with a full-sized balcony to the west, a decked outdoor entertaining domain with in-ground pool boasting a water-fall, a fire pit and beautiful manicured gardens are situated with a northerly aspect and sun-kissed all year round. The kitchen is complimented with 900mm gas cook top and oven, large scaled stone island bench and full butlers' pantry with highlight under cupboard lighting. The cosy living room features a stone wall which divides itself from the entrance and houses an open fireplace while the dining space allows for a substantial sized dining table. A further 4th exclusive living / TV room provides a place for serenity and features direct access to the balcony.
A few further features include, ocean views from every room, high ceilings, ducted vacuum, spotted gum timber floors, plenty of storage options, solar power system (5KW), powder room, ceiling fans, automatic external shades, and outdoor shower, all this and more on an incredible 3350m2 (approx.) private parcel of land surrounded by manicured gardens with a natural bush setting.
Beautifully maintained this attractive home maximises the opportunity to enjoy a luxurious and rewarding enviable Jan Juc lifestyle, only minutes from the RACV resort and clubhouse, beaches, local schools, kindergarten and Jan Juc village. If you are looking for the perfect lifestyle an inspection is highly recommended.
Insights: 4 other 5 bedroom house in Jan Juc have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal Downsizer, first home or investment!
Sitting on 419m2 this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with SLUG would make an ideal downsizer, first home or investment returning $380 /week. With an easy living layout it features a central hub with an open plan kitchen dining and lounge. Neutral tones throughout allow for any taste in décor. The kitchen has 600ml SS gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher. With tiles in the kitchen and dining and carpet in the lounge it makes for a practical and comfortable setting. The main bedroom with ensuite is at the front of the home while the remaining bedrooms are located to the east side and rear of the home. Sitting on 419m2 Outside is a blank slate. Currently lightly grassed with a concrete pad it is ready for the new owner to put their stamp on the property with landscaping and potentially an undercover area. This property represents outstanding value in Leopold a suburb that continues provide home owners with amazing capital growth. You'll need to be quick to snare this one!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 28 Volare Way, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern, bright & easy living
Youll love:
The sunlit & coastal charms of this modern 2-storey townhouse situated in an established and friendly neighbourhood thats also close to the heart of Torquay and all that it offers.
A delightfully spacious & open plan kitchen/dining/living area downstairs with an adjoining private north-facing courtyard make this home great for entertaining.
The well-considered floorplan also includes a large master retreat on the ground floor with generous BIRs & an ensuite, plus 2 double bedrooms upstairs (both with generous BIRs & lots of natural light).
High quality features throughout including raised ceilings, timber floors, reverse cycle heating/cooling, additional ceiling fans, double glazing and loads more.
Plus:
The kitchen has been impressively equipped with a 900mm freestanding cooker, lots of ample storage and a huge stone island bench.
Downstairs also includes a spacious formal entry, separate powder room & laundry while upstairs has another large bathroom, plus a cute study nook & extra built-in storage too.
Youll also love all the native & low maintenance planting, plus the double remote garage with direct internal access to the ground floor.
Ideal for young couples/families, retirees or those looking for a chic lock up & leave holiday rental one inspection will have you hooked!
Insights: 1 Koomeela Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2014 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
As new home full of coastal charm
Youll love:
This as new, Hamptons-inspired home has an attractive façade and stunning interiors, complemented by beautiful natural light & a fully landscaped, low maintenance block.
Its vast array of quality features throughout includes timber floors, shaker panel doors & cabinetry, subway tiling, pendant lighting, plantation shutters & more.
Preparing meals is a task made joyful thanks to the kitchens 900mm freestanding cooker, large stone island bench, walk-in pantry & beautiful feature window overlooking the street.
The spacious meals & living area adjoining the kitchen flows directly out into a sunny, private & paved courtyard area with a lush lawn & outdoor shower too.
Plus:
The master bedroom retreat includes a WIR and ensuite, while the second double bedroom also has generous built-in robes.
Enjoy ducted central heating & cooling throughout, plus the additional split system unit that services the main living room.
Other features include the main bathroom with separate shower & a full-sized bathtub, plus the laundry with its additional storage & direct access to the single remote garage.
Conveniently located within Quay 2 Estate, this well-built home is easy walking distance to North Torquays sporting fields, playgrounds, skateparks, shops, farmers market & more.

Description:
DOUBLE THE VALUE IN OLD TORQUAY
A truly rare opportunity presents itself with this incredible home in a very quiet location in old Torquay. The property has a unique floorplan that encompasses both the original 80's style beach home at the rear and a newer contemporary residence at the front. The unique plan gives great latitude for those looking for a commercial enterprise, whether it be to utilise as two separate revenue streams or occupy one property and lease the other.
Adding to the properties appeal is a delightful north facing garden and striking façade enhanced by it's limestone like block work construction, contributing to its individuality.
Upon entry you can take the stairwell upstairs to the homes secondary bedrooms, bathroom and sitting room with its own ceiling cassette heating and cooling system. The ground level has a separate study, huge master bedroom with walk through ensuite and large kitchen/dining/lounge room with a sliding door giving access to light filled undercover outdoor entertaining area. A separate door leads out to an area that houses the laundry, gives access to the double garage, second residence entry and stairwell. This further residence, which can be separated, has its own kitchen/lounge/dining area, two good sized bedrooms, bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. An external deck with seaview's, a further compliment to enhance this already impressive property.
Other features include: blackwood kitchen, bamboo timber floors, internal kitchen garden window, two person corner spa, reverse cycle heating and cooling, plenty of storage, carport, garden shed, additional car parking, electric solar panels and much more.
Superbly positioned only 400 metres from the beach and just a short stroll to cafes, restaurants, shops, schools and reserves, making the property the ideal proposition for all.
Insights: 17 Grandview Road, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2004 and 24 other 5 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Maximum value convenient locale.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Presented to perfection and ready for a new owner seeking maximum convenience in this peaceful locale. Built by a well known builder Bell and Fulton this property is Ideal for first home buyers, families seeking quality education or the savvy investor seeking massive growth.
This immaculate condition family home consists of four bedrooms, master with ensuite and BIR'S, central bathroom located for ease of day to day living for the remaining three bedrooms. Open plan kitchen and dining area leading you to the outdoor entertaining area with a separate lounge and formal dining room.
Rounding out this sensational offering is the well maintained gardens throughout offering plenty of off street parking and room for the kids to play whilst situated on a 654m2 approx. block with a north facing rear yard. Features include double carport, two split systems, electric wall heater, dishwasher and a work shop shed.
Within easy reach of the rapidly developing commercial hub in Torquay Road, High Street Shopping, Waurn Ponds Shopping, Oberon High School, Deakin University, Aquatic Centre, Epworth Hospital, the Ring Road taking you to Melbourne in under an hour, plus just a short hop to Barwon Heads and the Surf Coast. Major public and private investment in postcode 3216 secures your investment Enquire today!

Description:
Brilliant Position, Spectacular Home
With sweeping views across Geelong, this impressive residence offers everything sought after by today's modern family. A sprawling home with three separate living zones, beautiful gardens, fully renovated kitchen, bathroom and ensuite, off-street parking for up to five vehicles and minutes to the best that Waurn Ponds has to offer. Comprised of;
Master suite with private balcony, walk in robes & beautifully renovated ensuite with bath
A further four bedrooms with built in robes & ceiling fans
Renovated open-plan kitchen with walk in pantry, casual dining & living
Separate formal lounge with bar
Upstairs family room with balcony and wood-fired heating
Large formal dining or theatre room
Gas central heating and evaporative cooling throughout
Large, private landscaped gardens, outdoor dining and double garage with rear-yard
access for trailer or vehicle parking
With features too numerous to mention in total, one can only appreciate the quality of this home upon inspection. Located near Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, the Leisurelink Aquatic Centre, Waurn Ponds library and the Geelong Ring Road it's the perfect home in an unbeatable location.
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.
Internal area
302m²

Description:
Elegant Family Living In A Riverside Locale
Set within walking distance to the Barwon River, this family residence will impress with sweeping views and a north-facing entertaining deck. The downstairs retreat, complete with a kitchenette, is ideal for family members who enjoy their independence.
The formal living room flows onto the open plan kitchen/dining zone. Graced with a wood heater, the charming lounge opens onto both the balcony and entertaining deck. The stunning kitchen features stone benchtops, b/in pantry and apps (double oven, 900mm gas cooktop, two integrated dishwashers).
The Master BR exudes timeless elegance with b/in robes, w/in robe and en suite. Three additional BRs with b/in robes (one located in the downstairs retreat). Ducted heating and alarm system. Ample storage throughout. Remote double lock-up garage features internal access and a large storage area.
- Moments to Highton Village and the Barrabool Hills Plaza
- Close to Montpellier P.S and Newtown's private colleges
- Formal living flows onto the open plan kitchen/dining zone
- Charming lounge opens onto the wrap-around balcony and deck
- Stunning kitchen with stone benchtops and b/in pantry
- Double oven, 900mm gas cooktop, two integrated dishwashers
- Master BR features b/in robes, w/in robe and en suite
- Three additional BRs with b/in robes (one located downstairs)
- Ducted heating, wood heater, alarm system, north-facing yard
- Remote double lock-up garage with large storage area

Description:
A RARE OPPORTUNITY BUILT FOR COMFORT ON OWN TITLE!!
On its own title, this impressive 2-bedroom, 1 bath, 1 living room, brick unit set on 277m2 boasts its own frontage and a double lock up garage! Close to public transport and 3 minutes' drive to the local shopping center this beautifully presented and well cared for unit would suit first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike with a potential rent of $325 per week Comprising of a neat entry into the generous sized living area, double block out blinds, Led downlights, Vulcan gas wall furnace, ceiling fan and Mitsubishi split system heating and cooling for your comfort. The fantastic light filled kitchen/meals area seating up to 6 features an inbuilt sky light, great cupboard space and a Simpson oven with4 burner Gas cooktop and rangehood.
Off the living room you will find a hall with 2 great sized bedrooms, both with block out blinds, built in wardrobes and ceiling fans. The nicely tiled central bathroom features a good-sized bath, corner shower, heat lights and a separate toilet. A sliding door off the meals area gives you access out into the neat rear courtyard equipped with pergola and perfect for getting some sun or pottering around in the low maintenance garden which sprawls right around unit. A great sized double lock up, remote garage with internal access into the huge laundry which has ample storage space. An additional safety feature of the home is the camera security system installed. Located with easy access to public transport, close to primary and secondary schools, shopping centers at Newcomb Central + Bellarine Village, Splashdown aquatic center, sporting facilities and only 10 minutes to Geelong CBD and waterfront. Stylish and Built for convenience, security and comfort, there is nothing left to do except move in!
FEATURES
• 277m2 block on its own title (No Body Corp fees or shared driveway)
• Mitsubishi split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans in each room.
• Vulcan wall furnace
• Rent per week $325 (approx)
• Double lock up garage with internal access
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
SPACIOUS FAMILY HOME IN A GREAT LOCATION!!
This single storey custom built home encompasses the ultimate in single level living, impressively designed to blend generous living spaces with a low-maintenance lifestyle. This quality residence exhibits contemporary elegance and has been maintained with meticulous attention to detail. Positioned on a generous 634m2 (approx.) allotment it comprises four bedrooms plus study or 5th bedroom, master with en-suite including twin basin and walk in robe. A generous sized home theatre room that comes with a theatre system (projector, screen and surround system), open plan kitchen/dining and living area with plenty of natural sunlight and opens onto an undercover entertaining area, the kitchen features stone benchtops, plenty of cupboard space, Bosch stainless steel appliances, 900mm cooktop, oven and spacious walk in pantry. Add to this a central main bathroom, separate laundry, internal access to remote controlled double garage with an added workshop area. Other features of this home include an alarm system, high-ceilings, ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling, private rear yard, water tank and vegie boxes. This residence has been designed and built to compliment a relaxed, easy lifestyle with the emphasis on effortless indoor/outdoor living, all of this is in walking distance to the Dunes Shopping centre, The Quay oval and playground, Surf Coast Secondary College, Torquay North Primary School and only a short drive to the many beaches Torquay has to offer makes this home a fantastic lifestyle choice for many years to come.
Insights: 9 Centreside Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 24 other 5 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Your dream lifestyle awaits.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Standing proudly on a 1907 M2 allotment, "Berrimal" is your dream lifestyle waiting to happen. Set amidst landscaped low maintenance formal gardens, the Victorian style residence exudes style, quality and privacy, all in a convenient locale.
Beyond the tree lined front fence and through the gates, the circular driveway weaves its way to the entrance of the property.
Conveniently located minutes to the Ring Road, Deakin University and Waurn Ponds shopping precinct, the property boasts a multitude of quality appliances and features. Designed to enjoy the winter Northern and Western Sun, every window enjoys the beauty of its landscaped gardens which surround the entire property.
Upon entry, you are greeted with stunning parquetry floors. The opulent master bedroom, with two walk in robes and full ensuite with shower, vanity and toilet, takes full advantage of the rear Tuscan style gardens through large windows. A fourth bedroom with large built in robe is positioned nearby and overlooks the front garden. The functional floor plan then flows through to the formal lounge with decorative ceiling roses and formal dining with French doors which open to the undercover alfresco area and rear gardens. The spacious second and third bedrooms both feature built in desk area and overlook the front yard. A large central bathroom and separate toilet services the remaining two bedrooms.
At the heart of the home is the generous sized chef's kitchen. Complete with oversized preparation areas covered with 40mm Caesar stone, quality Miele appliances, abundant cupboard space and walk in pantry, the light filled kitchen is both stunning and functional. Here, a second prep area with feature bay window overlooks the rear gardens. The kitchen is adjacent to the sunny meals area with large windows, which flows through to a second living area and well appointed study, featuring built in cupboards and desk. A full sized laundry and powder room with separate vanity complete the rear of the property.
Through large glass sliding doors stunning hexagonal alfresco area creates a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living and is complete with removable clear panels, ideal for year-round entertaining. Large enough for family gatherings its sunny aspect enjoys the tranquil surrounds of the picture perfect Tuscany inspired gardens. Formal hedging, feature walls, blossom trees and water feature.... you will lose yourself in the serenity!
The substantial list of features include 9 ft ceilings throughout, intercom system, solar powered electricity,
2 x 22,000 litre water tanks, oversized double remote garage with workshop, and roller door access to rear yard.
With so much to love about this property, this charming family home that is lovingly maintained, immaculate inside and out, is sure to provide its new owners an oasis to reside in for many years to come.
Call me today for a private inspection of this impressive property.
Insights: First listed on 25 September, this house has been on Domain for 24 days. It was last sold in 2020 and 25 other 4 bedroom house in Waurn Ponds have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary Comfort with Great Outdoor Entertainment Area
With a curving driveway flanked by exotic palms and river stones, this smart architecturally designed home built by one of Barwon Heads best builders offers great contemporary comfort in one of Barwon Heads quiet neighbourhood precincts. A central passage delivers you to the master bedroom featuring twin built-in robes and a sparkling ensuite with a walk-in shower, designer vanity and WC. A powder room and spacious laundry precede the large, light-filled, open-plan lounge/kitchen/dining area with a built-in gas rock heater and split system. The user-friendly kitchen presents a 40mm Caesarstone island bench with an Asko dishwasher, a St.George electric wall oven, and an Electrolux 5-burner gas cooktop and rangehood. Double glass doors open onto a covered rear patio and spa, with a leafy garden beyond which features built-up vegie garden beds, a fernery, a fountain, a timber day-bed and a large garden shed - a delightful backdrop for alfresco dining and entertaining. The upstairs landing is set up as an intimate lounge/entertainment nook, but could also provide a discreet office workplace. Two more bedrooms share the central bathroom with shower, bath, and vanity - plus a separate WC. Other features include a single, lock-up garage, two underground water tanks, double glazing, and solar panels on the roof. Just a short 600m stroll to the Barwon River boardwalk plus a short distance through the Moonahs and Village park to Barwon Heads town centre.
Insights: 1/98 Taits Road, Barwon Heads VIC 3227 was last sold in 2009 and 32 other 3 bedroom house in Barwon Heads have recently been sold.

Description:
Coastal Moonah Magic
The Feel:
Incredible family memories begin at 25 Saratoga! Get ready to move straight in & enjoy the best of coastal living this summer, with everything you could imagine for a lifetime of leisure & entertaining. Freshly painted & boasting brand new Smeg appliances, this solid construction offers 4 bedrooms & 2 zoned living areas, with room to work from home. The ultimate backyard haven is composed of a huge covered courtyard, pool house, superb solar heated in-ground pool, BBQ & day bed - promoting versatile indoor/outdoor living under your very own Moonah forest.
The Facts:
-4 BR home on 669sqm approx. in highly sought-after pocket of Barwon Heads
-North frontage coastal woodland setting in desirable street with no-thru traffic
-Very private haven, fully fenced with ample OSP & extra parking for the toys
-Magnificent solar-heated, in-ground pool, surrounded by Spotted Gum decking
-Pool house (6x4m): entire north side bifold doors open onto deck
-6x4m solar-heated, in-ground pool (3 spa jets), features Spotted Gum decking & day bed
-Covered alfresco (5x4m) & Pool House (6x4m): entire north side bifold doors to pool deck
-Huge covered courtyard for the ultimate in year-round entertaining
-Family lounge & Master have brand new extra heavy duty/stain resistant twist pile carpet
-Timber laminate floors to entry & main living area
-Kitchen with servery-style brekky bar, feature cabinetry & step-in pantry
-All new appliances: Smeg electric oven & induction cooktop, F&P double-drawer DW
-Dining room welcomes the morning sun, adjacent to informal living area
-Master with private north outlook to Moonah trees + lockable WIR & en suite
-3 more carpeted BRs, 2 with stunning outlooks over the pool & iconic Moonah Trees
-Bathroom of its era with shower, bath & vanity & separate WC
-Professionally painted inside & out, with timber plantation shutters, present cool coastal vibes
-Zoned ducted heating/cooling provides year-round comfort, wifi controlled by mobile app
-Study nook allows you to work from home - NBN (with 2 lines)
-Ring doorbell allows you to monitor your entryway
-Steel framed house, clad in Western Red Cedar plus 3 garden sheds
-Walk to the Village Park, beach, Barwon Heads Primary & Hitchcock Avenue
The Owner Loves.
We spend most of our time outside under the Moonah Trees & relaxing in the pool, with countless memories of entertaining friends & BBQs. Its a beautiful sunny position & a great neighbourhood - we are excited for the next family to live here & create new memories.
